title: DeclarativeSystem
description: A declarative system definition for world simulation

description.description: Description of what this system does

enabled.description: Whether this system is active (default: true)

subtypeBonuses.description: Bonuses added to metric value based on entity subtype

runAtEpochEnd.description: Whether to only run at epoch end

fixedSubtype.description: Fixed subtype if subtypeFromMajority is false

descriptionTemplate.description: Use {count} for cluster size, {names} for entity names

connectionKind.description: Relationship kind that indicates connection between entities

tags.description: Tags that can be added to connected entities

minConnections.description: Minimum connections required to trigger convergence

probability.description: Probability of adding a convergence tag per tick

maxSharedTags.description: Maximum shared tags before stopping convergence

tags.description: Tags that can be added to isolated entities

maxConnections.description: Maximum connections to count as isolated

probability.description: Probability of adding a divergence tag per tick

maxTags.description: Maximum tags per entity to prevent tag bloat

minDivergent.description: Minimum divergent entities to trigger pressure

PlaneDiffusionSystem.description: True time-evolving 2D diffusion field simulation. Uses a 100x100 grid matching the semantic coordinate space. Sources SET values at their positions (Dirichlet boundary), then values diffuse via heat equation. Simulation runs uncapped internally; values are clamped to -100 to 100 only at output (tags).

sources.description: Entities that emit values into the diffusion field. Sources SET their value each tick (Dirichlet boundary condition).

tagFilter.description: Tag that marks an entity as a source

strengthTag.description: Optional tag containing numeric strength value (e.g., 'strength:50')

defaultStrength.description: Source strength value. Can be any number - simulation is uncapped. Values are clamped to -100 to 100 only when applied to entity tags.

sinks.description: Entities that absorb values from the diffusion field. Sinks SET negative values at their positions.

tagFilter.description: Tag that marks an entity as a sink

strengthTag.description: Optional tag containing numeric strength value

defaultStrength.description: Sink strength (will be negated). Can be any number - simulation is uncapped.

diffusion.description: Parameters controlling the heat equation discretization

rate.description: Diffusion coefficient (0-1). Controls how fast values spread to neighbors each tick. Recommended: 0.1-0.25. Values above 0.25 may cause numerical instability.

sourceRadius.description: Radius in grid cells around source/sink where values are directly SET. Default: 1. Larger values create broader fixed-value zones.

decayRate.description: How fast values decay toward zero each tick (0-1). Default: 0 (no decay). Use sparingly - decay fights against diffusion spreading.

falloffType.description: How source strength decreases within sourceRadius. absolute: strength-distance (100→99→98), none: full strength everywhere, linear/sqrt/etc: percentage-based falloff

iterationsPerTick.description: Number of diffusion iterations per tick. Higher values = faster spreading. Default: 20 (achieves ~50 cell spread in 15 ticks).

outputTags.description: Tags applied to entities based on their sampled field value (clamped to -100 to 100)

tag.description: Tag to set on entity when field value is in range

minValue.description: Minimum field value to set this tag (inclusive). Range: -100 to 100.

maxValue.description: Maximum field value to set this tag (exclusive). Range: -100 to 100.

valueTag.description: Optional: store clamped field value as tag value (e.g., 'field_value' → { field_value: '25.5' })

throttleChance.description: Probability of running this system each tick (0-1). Default: 1.0 (every tick).

proximityRelationshipKinds.description: Relationship kinds that indicate entities are in proximity for reinforcement

maxTemplatesPerTick.description: Hard cap on template executions per tick

minTemplatesPerTick.description: Minimum template executions per tick while growth is needed

yieldAveragingWindow.description: Rolling window size for average entities per template

maxAttemptsPerTick.description: Safety limit on template selection attempts per tick

betweenMatching.description: For create_relationship: pair entities that both pass condition
For create_relationship: create between all matching entities

AnyOrString.description: Either the literal 'any' (meaning match all) or a specific non-empty value

delta.description: Amount to adjust prominence by (positive or negative)

entity.description: Entity whose relationship is being transferred

actions.description: Actions to execute for each related entity

PressureChanges.description: Map of pressure ID to delta value
